script.line: new message from Clarence. My head is stuck in the blender.  Pick me up at the hospital after work.
Clear. You can stop at the Taco Bell bathroom, to take a nasty poop.
No, but Fox News reports: <prosody pitch="high"> hoe lee shit </prosody> a shark naydough.
Better idea, sharks don't like wine.
Hey jerk, stop bothering mee with dumb questions.
Ok, I'll pretend like I'm doing that <Break time="750ms"/> <prosody rate="slow"> I hate you. </prosody>
